page.title: Delta Pilots Ratify Concession Package
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Pilots at Delta Air Lines Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DAL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DAL.N</A> on Thursday ratified a concession package that will save the carrier \$1 billion a year, in a move the company hopes will buy it time to restructure outside of bankruptcy.
